verses.verse: And <WG2532> when he entered<WG1525> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> Capernaum<WG2584> after<WG1223> some days<WG2250>, <WG2532> it was noised<WG191> that<WG3754> he was<WG2076> in<WG1519> the house<WG3624>.

And2532, 2112 many<WG4183> were gathered together<WG4863>, so that<WG5620> there was no longer<WG5562> room<WG3371> for them<WG3366>, no, not even about<WG4314> the door<WG2374>: and<WG2532> he spake<WG2980> the word<WG3056> unto them<WG846>.
And <WG2532> they come<WG2064>, bringing<WG5342> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> a man sick of the palsy<WG3885>, borne<WG142> of<WG5259> four<WG5064>.

And <WG2532> when they could<WG1410> not<WG3361> come nigh unto<WG4331> him<WG846> for<WG1223> the crowd<WG3793>, they uncovered<WG648> the roof<WG4721> where<WG3699> he was<WG2258>: and<WG2532> when they had broken<WG1846> it up<WG1846>, they let down<WG5465> the bed<WG2895> whereon<WG3739> the sick of the palsy<WG3885> lay<WG2621>.
And <WG1492> Jesus<WG2424> seeing<WG1492> their<WG846> faith<WG4102> saith<WG3004> unto the sick of the palsy<WG3885>, Son<WG5043>, thy<WG4675> sins<WG266> are<WG1161> forgiven<WG863>.
But <WG1161> there were<WG2258> certain<WG5100> of the scribes<WG1122> sitting<WG2521> there<WG1563>, and<WG2532> reasoning<WG1260> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588>,
Why <WG5101> doth<WG2980> this<WG3778> man thus<WG3779> speak<WG2980>? he blasphemeth<WG988>: who<WG5101> can<WG1410> forgive<WG863> sins<WG266> but<WG3361> one<WG1520>, even God<WG2316>?

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> Jesus<WG2424>, perceiving<WG1921> in<WG4151> his<WG846> spirit<WG4151> that<WG3754> they<WG1260> so<WG3779> reasoned<WG1260> within<WG1722> themselves<WG1438>, saith<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> reason ye<WG1260> these things<WG5023> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>?

Which <WG5101> is<WG2076> easier<WG2123>, to say<WG2036> to the sick of the palsy<WG3885>, Thy sins<WG266> are forgiven<WG863>; <WG4671> or<WG2228> to say<WG2036>, Arise<WG1453>, and<WG2532> take up<WG142> thy<WG4675> bed<WG2895>, and<WG2532> walk<WG4043>?

But <WG1161> that<WG2443> ye may know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> hath<WG2192> authority<WG1849> on<WG1909> earth<WG1093> to forgive<WG863> sins<WG266> (he saith<WG3004> to the sick of the palsy<WG3885>),
I say<WG3004> unto thee<WG4671>, Arise<WG1453>, <WG2532> take up<WG142> thy<WG4675> bed<WG2895>, and<WG2532> go<WG5217> unto<WG1519> thy<WG4675> house<WG3624>.

And <WG2532> he arose<WG1453>, and straightway<WG2112> took up<WG142> the bed<WG2895>, and<WG2532> went forth<WG1831> before<WG1726> them all<WG3956>; insomuch that<WG5620> they were all<WG3956> amazed<WG1839>, and<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>, saying<WG3004>, We<WG1492> never<WG3763> saw<WG1492> it on this fashion<WG3754>.

And <WG2532> he went forth<WG1831> again<WG3825> by<WG3844> the sea side<WG2281>; and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the multitude<WG3793> resorted<WG2064> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> he taught<WG1321> them<WG846>.

And <WG2532> as he passed by<WG3855>, he saw<WG1492> Levi<WG3018> the<WG3588> son of Alphaeus<WG256> sitting<WG2521> at<WG1909> the place of toll<WG5058>, and<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Follow<WG190> me<WG3427>. And<WG2532> he<WG190> arose and<WG450> followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that he<WG846> was<WG1722> sitting at meat<WG2621> in<WG1722> his<WG846> house<WG3614>, and many<WG4183> publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners<WG268> sat<WG4873> down<WG2532> with<WG4873> Jesus<WG2424> and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>: for<WG1063> there were<WG2258> many<WG4183>, and<WG2532> they followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> of<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330>, when they saw<WG1492> that he<WG846> was eating<WG2068> with<WG3326> the sinners<WG268> and<WG2532> publicans<WG5057>, said<WG3004> unto<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, How is it<WG5101> that<WG3754> he eateth<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinketh<WG4095> with<WG3326> publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners<WG268>?

And when<WG191> Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> it<WG3004>, he saith unto them<WG846>, They that are whole<WG2480> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> need<WG5532> of a physician<WG2395>, but<WG235> they that are<WG2192> sick<WG2560>: I came<WG2064> not<WG3756> to call<WG2564> the righteous<WG1342>, but235, 1519, 3341 sinners<WG268>.

And <WG2532> John<WG2491>'s disciples<WG3101> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> were fasting<WG3522>: and<WG2532> they come<WG2064> and<WG2532> say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Why<WG5101> do John<WG2491>'s disciples<WG3101> and<WG2532> the disciples<WG3101> of the Pharisees<WG5330> fast<WG3522>, but<WG1161> thy<WG4674> disciples<WG3101> fast<WG3522> not<WG3756>?

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Can<WG1410> the sons<WG5207> of the bridechamber<WG3567> fast<WG3522>, while<WG3739> the bridegroom<WG3566> is<WG2076> with<WG3326> them<WG846>? as long as<WG3745> they have<WG2192> the bridegroom<WG3566> with<WG3326> them<WG1438>, they<WG1410> cannot<WG3756> fast<WG3522>.

But <WG1161> the days<WG2250> will come<WG2064>, when<WG3752> the bridegroom<WG3566> shall be taken away<WG522> from<WG575> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> then<WG5119> will they fast<WG3522> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day<WG2250>.

No man3762, 2532 seweth<WG1976> a piece<WG1915> of undressed<WG46> cloth<WG4470> on<WG1909> an<WG2440> old<WG3820> garment<WG2440>: else<WG1487> that which should fill it up<WG4138> taketh from<WG846> it<WG846>, the new from the old<WG3820>, and<WG2532> a worse<WG5501> rent<WG4978> is made<WG1096>.

And <WG2532> no man<WG3762> putteth<WG906> new<WG3501> wine<WG3631> into<WG1519> old<WG3820> wine-skins<WG779>; else<WG1161> the<WG3631> wine<WG3631> will burst<WG4486> the skins<WG779>, and<WG2532> the wine<WG3631> perisheth<WG1632>, and<WG2532> the skins<WG779>: but<WG235> they put<WG992> new<WG3501> wine<WG3631> into<WG1519> fresh<WG2537> wine-skins<WG779>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that<WG3899> he<WG846> was going<WG3899> on<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521> through<WG1223> the grainfields<WG4702>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> began<WG756>, as they went<WG3598>, to pluck<WG5089> the ears<WG4719>.

And <WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> said<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Behold<WG1492>, why<WG5101> do they<WG4160> on<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521> that which<WG3739> is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832>?

And <WG2532> he<WG846> said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Did<WG4160> ye<WG314> never<WG3763> read<WG314> what<WG5101> David<WG1138> did<WG4160>, when<WG3753> he had<WG2192> need<WG5532>, and<WG2532> was hungry<WG846>, he, and<WG2532> they that were<WG3588> with<WG3326> him<WG846>?

How <WG4459> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3624> of<WG1909> God<WG2316> when Abiathar<WG8> was high priest<WG749>, and<WG2532> ate<WG5315> the showbread<WG4286>, which<WG3739> it is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> to eat<WG5315> save for the priests<WG2409>, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> also<WG2532> to them that were<WG5607> with<WG4862> him<WG846>?
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, The sabbath<WG4521> was made<WG1096> for<WG1223> man<WG444>, and not<WG3756> man<WG444> for<WG1223> the sabbath<WG4521>:
so <WG5620> that the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> is<WG2076> lord<WG2962> even<WG2532> of the sabbath<WG4521>.
